statements: DELETE FROM network_traffic_data WHERE suspected_activity = TRUE;
DELETE FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE event_type = 'Malware Detected';
DELETE FROM network_traffic_data WHERE id = 10 AND protocol = 'TCP';
DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE event_type = 'Malware Attack' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE log_id IN (SELECT log_id FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE data_size > 1000);
DELETE FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = 'a24d73d9-9e66-41f2-a1a8-0b8bc8b23bf4' AND action = 'login';
